name: Chatbox
description: A desktop client for multiple cutting-edge LLM models. Cross-platform, supports search providers, custom models, Azure OpenAI, and more.

content.overview: Chatbox is a comprehensive desktop application that provides access to multiple cutting-edge large language models. It offers a cross-platform experience with support for various search providers, custom models, and integrations like Azure OpenAI. The application features a clean, user-friendly interface that makes interacting with advanced AI models simple and efficient.

features.title: Multiple Model Support
features.description: Compatible with OpenAI GPT models, Azure OpenAI, Claude, and support for custom model endpoints

features.title: Cross-Platform
features.description: Available for Windows, macOS, and Linux, ensuring consistent experience across different operating systems

features.title: Search Integration
features.description: Supports various search providers for enhanced information retrieval capabilities

features.title: Conversation Management
features.description: Robust conversation and prompt management with options to save, organize, and revisit past interactions

features.title: Markdown Rendering
features.description: Full support for Markdown formatting, including code blocks with syntax highlighting

useCases.title: Code Development

useCases.title: Learning and Research

advantages: Secure, private conversations on your desktop

faqs.question: Do I need an API key to use Chatbox?
faqs.answer: Yes, you'll need an API key from the service provider you wish to use (like OpenAI or Anthropic). The application allows you to enter your API key in the settings.

faqs.question: Can I use Chatbox offline?
faqs.answer: Chatbox requires an internet connection to communicate with the AI models' servers. However, your conversation history is stored locally on your device.

faqs.question: Is Chatbox available in multiple languages?
faqs.answer: Yes, Chatbox supports multiple languages for its interface, making it accessible to users worldwide.

faqs.question: How do I set up custom models in Chatbox?
faqs.answer: You can configure custom model endpoints in the settings menu by providing the necessary API endpoint URL and authentication details.
